sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function CartItem({item,value}) { const{id,title,img,price,total,count} = item; const{increment,decrement,removeItem} = value; return (
product : {title}
price : $ {price}
decrement(id)}> - {count} increment(id)}> +
{/* */}
{ removeItem(id)}}>
item total : $ {total}
) }
